about_the_game:
The Dynasty Edition includes:

  • Unlimited Dynasty Mode Access: Get the same great fully-customizable Dynasty Mode without having to worry about earning additional seasons. Start as many new saves and play as many seasons as you want.

  • Dynasty Pack: Get access to exclusive cosmetics, including Dynasty gloves, helmet, pants, mask, and fireball celebration.

This content requires the base game Maximum Football on Steam in order to play.
detailed_description:
The Dynasty Edition includes:

  • Unlimited Dynasty Mode Access: Get the same great fully-customizable Dynasty Mode without having to worry about earning additional seasons. Start as many new saves and play as many seasons as you want.

  • Dynasty Pack: Get access to exclusive cosmetics, including Dynasty gloves, helmet, pants, mask, and fireball celebration.

This content requires the base game Maximum Football on Steam in order to play.

name: Maximum Football: Dynasty Edition

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Lead your team to victory in Maximum Football, the fully customizable, free-to-play football simulation game. Build and design your team your way, recruit your roster, and call the plays to dominate the gridiron with precise, realistic gameplay in the ultimate football universe.
